content.en: Healthcare Reinforcement Learning: Researchers have explored the use of reinforcement learning algorithms in various healthcare domains to improve treatment strategies. These algorithms can extract optimal strategies directly from clinical data without relying on accurate mathematical models. They have the potential to recommend personalized treatment regimens for conditions such as cancer, sepsis, diabetes, and hypertension, and can even assist in surgical decision making. However, there are challenges and limitations that need to be addressed in order to fully utilize the potential of these algorithms in healthcare.
content.da: Sundheds-RL: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forstærkende læringsalgoritmer i forskellige sundhedsområder for at forbedre behandlingsstrategier. Disse algoritmer kan udtrække optimale strategier direkte fra kliniske data uden at være afhængige af nøjagtige matematiske modeller. De har potentiale til at anbefale personlige behandlingsregimer for tilstande som kræft, sepsis, diabetes og hypertension, og kan endda bistå i kirurgiske beslutningstagninger. Dog er der udfordringer og begrænsninger, der skal tackles for fuldt ud at kunne udnytte potentialet af disse algoritmer inden for sundhedssektoren.
